ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.ShowDebugLogsHint: Turn this on for bug reports
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.extendedStatusEffectsH: If enabled extends the official status list with a handful of useful token markers.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.initiativeDexTiebreake: If enabled initiative ties will be resolved using the initiative modifier; if not, monsters win by default.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.automateHPConditionsHi: If enabled, the Staggered and Dead conditions will be automatically applied and removed after hp changes; Disable this if you are using custom conditions via modules such as Combat Utility Belt - it is implicitly disabled if that module is active.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.staggeredOverlayHint: If enabled the staggered condition will be automatically applied as a token overlay instead of a normal condition.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.multiTargetAttackRolls: Enable this to automatically duplicate inline attack rolls for multi-target powers based on the number of targets.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.showDefensesInChatHint: Enable this display a list of targeted defenses in the attack line of chat power cards.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.hideInsteadOfOpaqueNam: Hide inactive Features / Triggers instead of making them faded-out
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.hideInsteadOfOpaqueHin: Enable this if you prefer not seeing inactive details at all.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.RoundUpDamageApplicati: When applying damage via the right-click context menu, should it round up (true) or round down (false)?
This will be applied the same way for both characters and npcs
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.autoAlterCritFumbleDam: Automatically double/zero damage on a crit/fumble
If this is enabled damage rolls will be automatically doubled on crits and set to zero on nat. 1s.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.rechargeOncePerDayHint: Attempt to recharge powers on quick rests only once (true) or re-attempt after every quick rest (false)?
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.originalCritDamageName: Double damage result on critical hit
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.originalCritDamageHint: Whether or not to double the damage roll result on critical hit instead of rolling double the number of damage dice.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.automatePowerCostHint: Remove resources (e.g. Command Points, Ki or Focus) automatically when using a power with a cost?
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.UnboundEscDieHint: Enable this setting to let the escalation die go above 6 and below 0 when manually adjusted (still remains limited when counting by the current round).
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.ColorblindHint: Change the colors of the power cards to more accessibility color palette.
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.automateBaseStatsFromC: Automatically populate AC, PD, MD, base HP, Recovery and Weapon dices based on class name(s).
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.tourVisibilityHint: When new versions of Toolkit13 are released, the system will display a tour of the changes. Use this setting to determine who should see the tours (or if they should be disabled).
ARCHMAGE.SETTINGS.tourVisibilityGM: Only the GM can see tours
ARCHMAGE.CHARACTERFLAGS.title: Flags
ARCHMAGE.CHARACTERFLAGS.initiativeAdvHin: Human racial feat to roll 2d20 for initiative and keep the higher roll.
ARCHMAGE.CHARACTERFLAGS.improvedIniative: General feat to increase initiative by +4.
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.featHint: Choose one feat as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.featureHint: Choose one class feature as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.hpHint: Increase your HP as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.extraMagicItemHint: Carry an extra Magic Item without becoming overwhelmed by Quirks
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpellHint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpell1Hint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpell2Hint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpell3Hint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.INCREMENTALS.powerSpell4Hint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
ARCHMAGE.PREPOPULATE.help: Click the checkboxes to the left of any powers you would like to add, and then click submit to add them to your character. You can click any power's name to expand it and view its text and available feats.
ARCHMAGE.str.label: Strength
ARCHMAGE.dex.label: Dexterity
ARCHMAGE.con.label: Constitution
ARCHMAGE.int.label: Intelligence
ARCHMAGE.wis.label: Wisdom
ARCHMAGE.cha.label: Charisma
ARCHMAGE.ac.label: Armor Class
ARCHMAGE.pd.label: Physical Defense
ARCHMAGE.md.label: Mental Defense
ARCHMAGE.name: Name
ARCHMAGE.byAction: Group by if the Power has an Action or Not
ARCHMAGE.byGroup: Group by manual Power Group value entry
ARCHMAGE.SORTS.name: Name
ARCHMAGE.ITEM.group: Things with the same group will be grouped together
ARCHMAGE.CHAT.QuickRestBody: Regain per-battle powers, roll to recharge spent recharge powers, and roll recoveries to heal above 50% health.
ARCHMAGE.CHAT.FullHealBody: Regain all health, recoveries, and power uses.
ARCHMAGE.CHAT.NoUsesMsg: No uses left, are you sure you want to use this?
ARCHMAGE.TARGETING.crescendoSpecial: You can choose more than one target for this spell, but you take a –2 penalty when attacking two targets, a –3 penalty for three targets, and so on.
ARCHMAGE.UI.errNotEnoughCP: You don't have enough Command Points to use this command. Use anyway?
ARCHMAGE.UI.errNotEnoughKi: You don't have enough Ki to use this power. Use anyway?
ARCHMAGE.UI.errNoMomentum: You need Momentum to use this power. Use anyway?
ARCHMAGE.UI.errNoFocus: You need Focus to use this power. Use anyway?
ARCHMAGE.UI.errDependency: The vueport and dlopen modules are required for the V2 character sheet. Return to the Foundry setup page and use the module installer to install both of those modules to allow the V2 character sheet to be available.
ARCHMAGE.UI.dependencyContent: The V2 character sheet requires the VuePort and dlopen modules to be enabled. Would you like to enable them now?
ARCHMAGE.UI.tooManyLevels: Changing a monster by more than 6 levels is not recommended.
ARCHMAGE.UI.levelLimits: Level can't increase above 15 or decrease below 0.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.welcome: Welcome to Toolkit13 (13th Age Compatible) version 1.7.0! Here's a quick tour of new features
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.documentation: We have started the (long) process of writing documentation for the system. If you have documentation you want to contribute, please reach out or issue a Pull Request!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.cards: We now have Card Support for Icon Relationship 5's and 6's - Please see the documentation for more info on how to enable and set this up
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.sheets: Character sheets have been reworked. Open one up to check it out!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.showItem: You can now show an Item to all players with a new 'Show to Players' button
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.iconRelationships: Rolling Icon Relationships now has a nicer Chat display, along with Disengage and Save checks
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.monstersCompendium: There is now a system-provided Monsters Compendium
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.generalFeats: Along with General Feats, courtesy of the Community!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.170.end: There's a variety of bug fixes and minor tweaks as well, such as to Trigger automation. Come join us in the Foundry Discord #13th-age channel for questions and feedback!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.180.welcome: Welcome to Toolkit13 (13th Age Compatible) version 1.8.0! Here's a quick tour of new features
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.180.monkCompendium: The Monk compendium is back up and available to use! Monk forms come preloaded with groups, so checkout the manual group sorting option on monk character sheets! Go jab, punch, and kick your way to victory!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.180.escalationDie: The Escalation die is now manually adjustable, and via a new System Setting can even go past 9000! (6 is the default max)
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.180.tierShorthand: Thanks to LegoFed3, there is now a @tier shorthand for Actors. Tier is the multiplier for each tier (1x adv, 2x cha, 3x epic)
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.180.end: There's a variety of bug fixes and minor tweaks as well, such as multi-class health calculations and various compendium updates. Come join us in the Foundry Discord #13th-age channel for questions and feedback!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.welcome: Welcome to Toolkit13 (13th Age Compatible) version 1.9.0! Here's a quick tour of new features
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.aip: Added basic support for the Autocomplete Inline Properties (https://foundryvtt.com/packages/autocomplete-inline-properties/) module, if enabled.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.necromancer: The Necromancer compendium is back up and available to use! Go Raise Hell!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.colorblind: Thanks to EndlesNights, we now have colorblind options. Check out the System Settings - powers should be much clearer for colorblind players!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.baseStats: HP, AC, Damage dice, and more are now optionally calculated automatically based on your Class. Huge thanks to LegoFed3 for this!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.inlineRoll: All Power Compendiums should now have inline Rolls. Thanks to everyone in the community who helped!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.inlineRollDocs: We now have additional documentation for inline Rolls in the Reference dialog!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.systemDocs: Our System documentation has been expanded even further, and is now in Gitbooks for a better experience
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.chatCards: Ability / Background checks now have a new Chat Card layout that includes useful information such as "Background used". The Icon Roll Chat Cards got a makeover as well - roll the dice and see what the Icons bring!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.190.end: There's a variety of bug fixes and minor tweaks as well, such as fixing powers in the Compendiums, adding Weakling / Elite to creature sizes, negative recovery logic, and more. Come join us in the Foundry Discord #13th-age channel for questions and feedback!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.welcome: Welcome to Toolkit13 (13th Age Compatible) version 1.10.0! Here's a quick tour of new features
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.v2Sheet: We've redesigned the character sheet! The overall structure is the same, but everything that's rollable will now have a blue d20 near it, and the sheet will feel more responsive. If you prefer the original sheet, you can return to the original sheet per character by clicking the "Sheet" settings gear in the header of the sheet window.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.nightMode: The new character sheet has a night mode! Click the tab on the sheet and find it near the bottom of the right sidebar.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.rolls: Many more areas of the sheet are now rollable, such as initiative, death saves, icon rolls, and more. Watch out for a blue icon to find rollable links!
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.iconRolls: Icon rolls are now stored on the sheet! You can also click an icon result icon to cycle through 5, 6, and empty results.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.rests: The sheet now supports both quick rests and full heal-ups! Find them in the new resources section of the character sheet directly above powers.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.powerImporter: The power importer has been redesigned! The new design is much closer to a character builder, and will pull from any classes and races detected on your character sheet.
ARCHMAGE.TOURS.1100.end: There's also a variety of bug fixes and minor tweaks added to the system! Come join us in the Foundry Discord #13th-age channel for questions and feedback!
